name: Desk (bureau "Mazarin")
description: Desk (bureau "Mazarin"); Unknown; Paris, France; about 1692 - 1700; Fir, veneered with brass, copper, silver, ebony, bone, horn (some painted blue, green, orange and red and laid on gold foil), mother-of-pearl, and tortoiseshell; drawers of beech, oak, walnut; silvered-bronze mount; silk velvet; steel key; 70.5 × 88.9 × 50.8 cm (27 3/4 × 35 × 20 in.); 87.DA.77; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Desk (bureau "Mazarin")
medium: Fir, veneered with brass, copper, silver, ebony, bone, horn (some painted blue, green, orange and red and laid on gold foil), mother-of-pearl, and tortoiseshell; drawers of beech, oak, walnut; silvered-bronze mount; silk velvet; steel key
